about_the_game:
Don’t Shoot the Humans! is a horror-detective game that immerses you in a tense first-person journey of life-or-death decisions.

As a seasoned detective, you’ve been dispatched to a shadowy forest to locate a missing child.

Armed with only a single firearm and your instincts, you’ll encounter eerie, humanoid figures shrouded in darkness. Each figure presents an impossible choice: shoot or spare.

Explore the environment to find clues to aid you in determining what the humans ACTUALLY look like.

If you mistakenly shoot a human or spare a non-human, the consequences are deathly and the case is over.

Features:

  • psychological horror

  • Atmospheric environment 

  • Tense Life and death decisions

  • Investigative game play 

  • Hidden clues and secrets

  • Non-linear storytelling

Don’t Shoot the Humans! delivers a tense, atmospheric blend of moral dilemma, investigative gameplay, and psychological horror. Can you save the child, solve the mystery, and uncover the truth? Or will one wrong choice doom you to a fate worse than death? Every shot counts.

name: Don't Shoot The Humans!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 / AMD Ryzen 5 2500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1080p NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space GB available space

short_description: Don’t Shoot the Humans! delivers a tense, atmospheric blend of moral dilemma, investigative gameplay, and psychological horror. Can you save the girl, solve the mystery, and uncover the truth? Or will one wrong choice doom you to a fate worse than death? Every shot counts.
